name: cymulate-endpoint-security
label: Cymulate Endpoint Security - BAS
description:
The Cymulate Exposure Management and Security Validation Platform provides the technology for exposure
discovery, validation, and prioritization with business insights and intelligence. This simplifies security leadersâ€™ risk
and resilience to emergent threats and a rapidly changing attack surface. With a complete view of the security
posture and business risks, the Cymulate platform gives security leaders the data they need to define the scope for cyber initiatives, successfully mobilize mitigations, and continuously assess security operations performance.

fields.name: url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the Cymulate server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: key
fields.title: Secret Key
fields.tooltip: Specify the Secret Key of the API Application already created in the Cymulate Server.
fields.description: Specify the Secret Key of the API Application already created in the Cymulate Server.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. 
By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Create Assessment
operations.description: Creates an Endpoint Security assessment based on the input parameters values provided.

parameters.name: agentName
parameters.title: Agent Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the agent name (Computer Name).
parameters.description: Specify the agent name (Computer Name).

parameters.name: agentProfileName
parameters.title: Agent Profile Name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the profile name. eg: NT AUTHORITY\\System (for service based agent)
parameters.description: Specify the profile name. eg: NT AUTHORITY\\System (for service based agent)

parameters.name: templateID
parameters.title: Template ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the template ID. eg : 5c692...
parameters.description: Specify the template ID. eg : 5c692...

parameters.name: worm_ipRange_exclude
parameters.title: Worm IP Range to Exclude
parameters.tooltip: Specify the worm IP range to exclude.
parameters.description: Specify the worm IP range to exclude.

parameters.name: scheduleLoop
parameters.title: Schedule Loop
parameters.tooltip: Specify the frequency for triggering the assessment eg: one-time.
parameters.description: Specify the frequency for triggering the assessment eg: one-time.

parameters.name: integrationsSelected
parameters.title: Integrations to Select
parameters.tooltip: Specify the integrations to select.
parameters.description: Specify the crown jewels (Important resources on which to create assessment).

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.title: Schedule
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time at which assessment should be triggered.
parameters.description: Specify the time at which assessment should be triggered.

operations.title: Get Latest Report Results
operations.description: Retrieves the latest endpoint security report results from the Cymulate server.

parameters.name: env
parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.

operations.title: Get Latest Technical Report Results
operations.description: Retrieves the latest endpoint security technical report results from the Cymulate server.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.title: Offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to skip.
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the limit of how many items to get - Default = 100.
parameters.description: Specify the limit of how many items to get - Default = 100.

parameters.name: env
parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest technical report results for the Default environment.
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest technical report results for the Default environment.

operations.title: Get Latest SIEM Detection Results
operations.description: Retrieves the latest SIEM detection results from endpoint security assessments from Cymulate server.

parameters.name: env
parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest technical report results for the Default environment.
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest technical report results for the Default environment.

operations.title: Get Detection Results By Payload ID
operations.description: Retrieves the detection result data for a specific payload ID from Cymulate server.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Payload ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the endpoint security payload ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.
parameters.description: Specify the endpoint security payload ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.

operations.title: Get Attack Navigator Results
operations.description: Retrieves the latest (overview) Endpoint Security ATTACK navigator report results by environment ID from Cymulate server.

parameters.name: env
parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.

operations.title: Get Attack Navigator Results By Assessment ID
operations.description: Retrieves the Endpoint Security ATTACK navigator report results for a specific assessment from Cymulate server.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.

operations.title: Get Assessment History
operations.description: Retrieves the Endpoint Security assessment history within the date range provided. If a date range is not provided, the response will retrieve the history from the last 30 days from Cymulate server.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.title: From Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date from where to fetch assessments.
parameters.description: Specify the date from where to fetch assessments.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.title: To Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date until which assessments should be fetched.
parameters.description: Specify the date until which assessments should be fetched.

parameters.name: env
parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.

operations.title: Get Technical Report Results By Assessment ID
operations.description: Retrieves the endpoint security technical report results for a specific assessment from the Cymulate server.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.title: Offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to skip.
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the limit of how many items to get - Default = all.
parameters.description: Specify the limit of how many items to get - Default = all.

operations.title: Get Executive Report Results By Assessment ID
operations.description: Retrieves the Endpoint Security executive report results for a specific assessment from the Cymulate server.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.

operations.title: Get Template List
operations.description: Retrieve a list of available Endpoint Security templates from Cymulate server.

operations.title: Get Template By ID
operations.description: Retrieve a specific Endpoint Security template by its ID from Cymulate server.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Template ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the template ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.
parameters.description: Specify the template ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.

operations.title: Get Assessment Status
operations.description: Retrieve an Endpoint Security assessment status by the assessment ID from Cymulate server.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID whose details to retrieve from Cymulate server.

operations.title: Stop Assessment
operations.description: Stop an Endpoint Security assessment that is running in Cymulate.

parameters.name: env
parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the most recently launched assessment will be stopped.
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the most recently launched assessment will be stopped.
